title: Looking for a top laner, mid and jungle
body:
Hey there,

We are high silver looking for a top laner and possibly a mid or jungle of similar ranks. 

At the moment our bot lane is locked in and I myself can play Jungle or mid, depending on the response we get I will go with which ever.

Add me in game: Satsii

Will only discuss with you in game as I probably won't check back here so be sure to add me and say you saw this post

Would prefer that you're available a lot, at the moment we have a top and jungle who aren't on often and you will be taking their spot. At present we have 3 members on almost every night.

replies.body:
im on heaps. but ive been playing duo bot for a while now. still a hardy jungler and can mid.

i mostly play jungle in teams because 99% of people cant do %%%% in the jungle except SURVIVE. and no one seems to follow timers even tho they are in the bloody game now.

oh, and im a shot caller. so if you need that, i do that pretty decently.
